title: Cross-Architecture Knowledge Distillation (KD) for Retinal Fundus Image Anomaly Detection on NVIDIA Jetson Nano
summary: Early and accurate identification of retinal ailments is crucial for averting ocular decline; however, access to dependable diagnostic devices is not often available in low-resourced settings. This project proposes to solve that by developing a lightweight, edge-device deployable disease classifier using cross-architecture knowledge distilling.
